introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this section is じゅんび which you will often hear in situations involving planning events, organizing activities, and getting ready for exams.
meaning_explanation_english: The word "じゅんび" means preparation or readiness. It refers to the action of getting everything ready or set for a particular task, event, or situation. This could include making plans, organizing materials, or ensuring all necessary items are in place. It is commonly used when discussing getting ready for a trip, preparing for an exam, or setting up an event.
kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonym_explanation: The most common synonyms of the word "じゅんび" are "ようい" and "したく." While all three words refer to preparation, "ようい" often emphasizes the ease and readiness of preparation, like having everything laid out and ready to go. On the other hand, "したく" can imply personal preparation, similar to getting dressed or ready for a personal event.

collocations.kanji: じゅんびをととのえる
collocations.furigana: じゅんびをととのえる

example_sentences.furigana: 準備(じゅんび)が終(お)わりました。

translations.VI: Sự chuẩn bị đã kết thúc.

example_sentences.furigana: 準備(じゅんび)ができました。

example_sentences.kanji: 明日は旅行の準備をします。
example_sentences.furigana: 明日(あした)は旅行(りょこう)の準備(じゅんび)をします。

translations.EN: I will prepare for the trip tomorrow.
translations.VI: Ngày mai tôi sẽ chuẩn bị cho chuyến đi.
translations.BN: আগামীকাল আমি ভ্রমণের জন্য প্রস্তুতি নেব।
translations.ZH: 明天我将为旅行做准备。
translations.TL: Bukas maghahanda ako para sa biyahe.
translations.MY: မနက်ဖြန် ခရီးစဉ်အတွက် ပြင်ဆင်ပါမည်။
translations.HI: कल की यात्रा के लिए तैयारियाँ करूँगा।

example_sentences.kanji: 私は明日旅行の準備を整える。
example_sentences.furigana: 私は明日(あした)旅行(りょこう)の準備(じゅんび)を整(ととの)える。

translations.EN: I will prepare for the trip tomorrow.
translations.ID: Saya akan menyiapkan perjalanan untuk besok.
translations.VI: Tôi sẽ chuẩn bị cho chuyến đi vào ngày mai.
translations.FR: Je vais préparer le voyage pour demain.
translations.NE: म भोलि यात्रा को तयारी गर्छु।
translations.ZH: 我将为明天的旅行做准备。
translations.KO: 나는 내일 여행 준비를 할 것이다.
translations.TL: Maghahanda ako para sa paglalakbay bukas.
translations.MY: ကျွန်ုပ်သည်မနက်ဖြန်ခရီးသွားရန်ပြင်ဆင်ပါမည်။
translations.HI: मैं कल यात्रा की तैयारी करूंगा।
translations.FA: من فردا برای سفر آماده می‌شوم.

example_sentences.kanji: 準備なしで出発しました。
example_sentences.furigana: 準備(じゅんび)なしで出発(しゅっぱつ)しました。

translations.VI: Tôi khởi hành mà không chuẩn bị.
translations.MY: ပြင်ဆင်မှုမရှိဘဲထွက်ပြေးသွားပါတယ်။
translations.HI: बिना तैयारी के रवाना हो गया।

preparation.MY: ပြင်ဆင်မှု
